TopicTitle: Hello from a fellow ksp player!

Articles.Content:
Greetings to all, I'm Fabrizio, an Italian ksp player, I really enjoy this awesome game and I would like to take the chance to thank the Squad team for theyr hard work!

I thank also all the amazing community, YOU ALL, for making this game even more awesome and helping out those new player (like me) with suggestions and tutorials!

So, thank you all and keep with that good job, and of course, enjoy and fly safe!
Welcome to the Forum Have fun!

Hello Grillbert, and welcome to the forum.

Your English is fine, but just in case it escaped your notice, there is also a sub-forum for Italian KSP players. You are welcome there, and also in the English areas.
